text: Klaus Hänsch (born 15 December 1938) is a German Politician. He was a Member of the European Parliament representing the SPD from 17 July 1979 until 13 July 2009, and sat with the Party of European Socialists group. ==Other websites== * Official site * Official page on the European Parliament website Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:MEPs for Germany Category:Presidents of the European Parliament
title: Klaus Hänsch
